org.activebpel.rt.config
Class AeConfigurationUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.config.AeConfigurationUtil
public class AeConfigurationUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A static helper/util class for dealing with "entry" based configuration files, such as the ActiveBPEL Engine Config format.

                       throws AeException

Throws:
AeException - If an error occurs saving the config to the writer.

createConfigSpecificClass

public static java.lang.Object createConfigSpecificClass(java.util.Map aConfig)
                                                  throws AeException
This method takes a configuration map for a config class and instantiates that class. This involves some simple java reflection to find the proper constructer and then calling that constructor. Any class can use this method, as long as the class in question has a constructor that takes the configuration map, or a default no-arg constructor. Returns null if no config is specified.

Parameters:
aConfig - The engine configuration map for the class.
Returns:
A config class.
Throws:
AeException

createConfigSpecificClass

public static java.lang.Object createConfigSpecificClass(java.util.Map aConfig,
                                                         java.lang.Object aCtorArg,
                                                         java.lang.Class aCtorArgClass)
                                                  throws AeException
This method takes a configuration map for a config class and second argument and instantiates that class. This involves some simple java reflection to find the proper constructer and then calling that constructor. Any class can use this method, as long as the class in question has a constructor that takes the configuration map and a second argument, or a default no-arg constructor. Returns null if no config is specified.

Parameters:
aConfig - The engine configuration map for the class.
aCtorArg - The second argument (after confg map).
aCtorArgClass - The second argument type class.
Returns:
A config class.
Throws:
AeException

createConfigSpecificClass

public static java.lang.Object createConfigSpecificClass(java.util.Map aConfig,
                                                         java.lang.Object[] aArgs,
                                                         java.lang.Class[] aClasses)
                                                  throws AeException
This method takes a configuration map for a config class and second argument and instantiates that class. This involves some simple java reflection to find the proper constructer and then calling that constructor. Any class can use this method, as long as the class in question has a constructor that takes the configuration map and a second argument, or a default no-arg constructor. Returns null if no config is specified.

Parameters:
aConfig -
aArgs -
aClasses -
Throws:
AeException

loadEntries

protected static java.util.Map loadEntries(org.w3c.dom.Element aElement)
Load entries from the passed element, note this routione is recursive. It builds maps for any nested config entries.

Parameters:
aElement - The element to fill in the passed entry map for.

writeEntries

private static void writeEntries(org.w3c.dom.Element aParent,
                                 java.util.Map aEntries)
Writes a map of entries as children of the passed element, recursively.

Parameters:
aParent - The parent element to contain the child entries
aEntries - the entries to write.

copyEntries

public static void copyEntries(java.util.Map aSource,
                               java.util.Map aTarget)
Recursively copies config entry map from the source to the target.

Parameters:
aSource - source entry map
aTarget - target entry map
